name: Twisted Fates v1.8
author: Zobody
homebrewRules: There are 3 alignments/teams: good, evil and fated, and 3 character types:
Good team wins when all evils die.
Evil team wins when all fated die.
Fated team wins when all good die.
Team that wins | Team that died out
Game immediately ends when all players in any of the teams are dead.
Because Sleepwalker must be in the game, put in all character tokens except the Sleepwalker in the bag, and then assign the "Sleepwalker" reminder token to a Vile or a Fatebound player.

name: Zenith
ability: Each night*, choose any number of players: if they are on the same team, they cannot die tonight.
blurb: Zenith can protect players of the same alignment.
explanations: Zenith does not care about character type, only on alignment.
If a character states that someone dies tonight, players protected by Zenith cannot die from that character.

If a character states that someone dies tonight and all viable characters are protected by Zenith, nobody can die (this situation doesn't arrive in practice, as there are always at least 2 players not protected).
Zenith may any number of players: 0 players (choosing not to act), 1 player (can pick themselves or someone else), 2 players or more players (can include or exclude themselves).
examples: Zenith chooses themselves. Cutthroat targets them, but Zenith does not die.
Zenith was marked by Neolith the previous night, and another marked player died today. Zenith chooses themselves and Calamity, but Calamity is killed by the Savage.
Zenith chooses the Apostle and Cutthroat. Neither of them are protected, because they are on different teams. The Neolith's ability kills the Apostle.
Zenith chooses the Weaver tonight. Cutthroat tries to kill the Weaver, but Weaver survives.
Zenith chose themselves tonight. The next day, Calamity is executed. Zenith is killed by Calamity's ability.

name: Calamity
ability: The 1st time you are executed (not the 1st day), all living players die & all dead players come back to life. You stay dead.

name: Elixir
ability: You cannot die from execution if you were nominated by a fated.

name: Sleepwalker
ability: You do not know you are a Peacebroker. You think that you are either Vile or Fatebound.

name: Cutthroat
ability: Each night*, choose a player who was nominated today: they die.

name: Savage
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they are not on the same team as last executee, they die.

name: Wanton
ability: Each night*, if you nominated today, all other non-evil players are poisoned tonight. Otherwise, a player dies tonight.

name: Neolith
ability: Each night, mark a player. If a marked player died today, all marked players are poisoned until dusk & a player dies tonight.

name: Weaver
ability: You start knowing the entire Grimoire. Players of your alignment register falsely to you in the Grimoire you see.

name: Seeker
ability: You start knowing a player & their alignment. When the player you know dies, you learn another.

name: Mangler
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players (not yourself): they swap alignments. If just 4 players live, you lose this ability.

name: Apostle
ability: Each night* you become the alignment of the 1st player who nominated today. When the game ends, you become fated.
